title: Opinion: The 2024 Vuelta a España Will Be Better Without GC-Slayers Pogačar, Vingegaard, Evenepoel
content:
The absence of the Tour de France dominators creates a power vacuum at the top of a wide-open classification pack that should bring wild, dynamic racing.

Read the full article at Opinion: The 2024 Vuelta a España Will Be Better Without GC-Slayers Pogačar, Vingegaard, Evenepoel on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
